price: 70. Waxaa uun la ii waxyooday, inaan ahay dige iska cad.
arabic: إِن يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيَّ إِلَّآ أَنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: in yūḥā ilayya illā annamā anā nadhīrun mubīnun
